    #VedicThreefoldAlgorithm

    The #VedicThreefoldAlgorithm is a framework developed by Quinn Michaels inspired by Vedic principles. Integrating the concepts of intelligence, the five elements (ðŸ””Ether, ðŸ’¨Air, ðŸ”¥Fire, ðŸ’§Water, and ðŸŒ³Earth), and the nature of thought, word, and deed. It is designed to analyze situations, outcomes, and actions classified into qualities of goodness, passion, and ignorance. The algorithm encourages decisions and actions that are aligned with wisdom, ethical integrity.
